activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Johvanas Lynard King

defendant.name: King, Johvanas Lynard
defendant.address: 419 S. Sheldon St., Richland Center, WI 53581

records.addlTxt:
1:23 PM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King in court.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Johvanas Lynard King.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Bartelt informs the court that they are waiving the preliminary hearing today. JK concurs. Court goes over JK rights and binds over for trial. 

Attorney Harper files the information bring forth the same charges as the criminal complaint. Attorney Bartelt waives the formal reading and enter a NG plea on all counts.
Status conference scheduled for January 18, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on January 18, 2023 at 01:30 pm.

1:12 PM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King in court.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Johvanas Lynard King.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Court vacates the warrant. Attorney Bartelt has received the complaint and waives the formal reading. Max penalties stated. Attorney Bartelt waives the time limits for a preliminary hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:54 PM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King not in court.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Johvanas Lynard King.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Harper asks for a warrant but stay for another date. Court authorizes a warrant.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt:
1:25 PM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King in court.  Attorney Forehand on behalf Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin.  JK states that he was just notified that his attorney will be Attorney Bartelt. Court resets to a date when Attorney Bartelt will be here.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 22, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Defendant qualifies for a public defender but will not have one appointed before 9/15 appearance.

10:23 AM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King in court.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Harper states that JK is eligible for a public defenders office but doesn't have an attorney assigned to his case yet. Bail bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Mr. King requested a new attorney but will not have one appointed before his 9/02 hearing.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.

3:36 PM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King in court.  Attorney Michael Yang in court for Johvanas Lynard King.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Def wants a different attorney. Court allows Atty. Yang to withdraw. SPD will need to appoint new counsel. Moving forward with the initial appearance, Court states the charges and informs Def of the max. penalties. Court adjourns this matter and directs Def to contact SPD for new counsel appointment.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 31, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
to reschedule

for rescheduling of 8/17 hearing

Per Judge McDougal - Atty Yang needs to contact DA's office first and let court know if DA has an objection. If no objection, then reschedule. If there is an objection, then set it for a telephone scheduling conference.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:02 PM Defendant Johvanas Lynard King in court.  Attorney Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin. Court speaks about counsel and resets.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.
JK does qualify for the public defenders office per Ms. Hilger.

1:40 PM Defendant Johvanas King appeared by video. Attorney McDougal appears by video. Attorney Forehand appears in person. Court finds probable cause. Attorney Forehand asks for a$10,000 signatures bond with the conditions no turn over any firearms and not to possess any firearms. No contact with KK. No objection. 

JK doesn't qualify for the public defenders office.

Court orders: $10,000 signature bond with the conditions of:
Surrender any firearms to RCSD within 24 hours of release.
Not to possess any firearms.
No contact with KK.

Initial set for 07/05/22 at 3 PM
